pr_title: A simple stress-test for the TracerSdk.

timeline.message: A simple stress-test for the TracerSdk.

timeline.bodyText: I would add the batchsp as well and count the num spans in the exporter. Since it is most likely that batchsp will be almost everywhere.
timeline.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: yep. easy to add; i'll make it happen

replies.bodyText: done, as an additional stress test.
replies.author: jkwatson

timeline.message: Add a stress-test that includes the batch span processor.
